update.description: Don't forget to get your service hours in!
Are you active? Check on the Facebook page!
Remember, Brother Meetings are Thursdays at 8pm in Remsen 101. Pledge Meetings are Sundays at 5pm in Schaffer 101. Executive Board Meetings are at 4pm before Pledge Meetings in Shaffer 101.
Remember to come on time to meetings or they won't count.
Bigs and littles: don't forget to complete your tasks!
Submit articles and photos to the newsletter! Email them to jhu.apo.historian@gmail.com.
Submit photos for the weekly caption contest! Don't forget to comment with a witty caption on the weekly pic!
